descriptions.description:
Hase is a worms like game with gravitation. And hares instead of worms.
Changelog: Version 1.3: - Network support
Version 1.4: - 5s extra time after last bullet - 3 weapon points per turn - Locking zoom - Improved Aiming - New health bar - Fixed a bug in the bullet calculation - improved button mapping, using SP_PRACTICE - Writing down tractory while flying - New window approach - Menu - Multiple hares per player - New controls - Global health bar - Particle Effect - 6 Weapons
Version 1.4.1: - Fixed little bug after finished turn in online game - AI is smarter (no friendly fire) - Faster canceling online game - Canceled online game will have no replay
Version 1.4.1.1: - Added clock preference (900 Mhz) to PXML
